amendment.description: Amendment fully funds Section 7081 of the SUPPORT Act, preventing overdoses while in emergency rooms. The program would create a coordinated care model for overdose patients who present in the emergency room.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to fully fund Section 7081 of the SUPPORT Act, preventing overdoses while in emergency rooms. The program would create a coordinated care model for overdose patients who present in the emergency room.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 415 - 9 (Roll no. 275).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 415 - 9 (Roll no. 275).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. McKinley.
